CustomField.description: BODEV-4539 New Field on Opportunity Table to Track Opportunity Deal Size Categorize deals based on their Original Renewal ARR and ARR values. This field enables quick filtering and reporting for Clari.
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Professional Services"), NULL, /* Exclude Professional Services - No ARR Calculation */
IF( OR( ARR_manual__c < 0, Original_Renewal_ARR__c < 0 ), NULL, /* Exclude negative ARR values */
IF( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Renewal"), (Original_Renewal_ARR__c / CURRENCYRATE(TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode))) * CURRENCYRATE("USD") >= 100000 ), AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Renewal")), (ARR_manual__c / CURRENCYRATE(TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode))) * CURRENCYRATE("USD") >= 100000 ) ), "100K+ USD",
IF( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Renewal"), (Original_Renewal_ARR__c / CURRENCYRATE(TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode))) * CURRENCYRATE("USD") >= 50000 ), AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Existing Business-Renewal")), (ARR_manual__c / CURRENCYRATE(TEXT(CurrencyIsoCode))) * CURRENCYRATE("USD") >= 50000 ) ), "50-100K USD", "Under 50K USD" ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Deal Value Category
